name: Alchemist Millionare
description:
This project was made for the 97th Weekly Game Jam. The Topic was "Strange Garden" and I am excited to present you my submission.

In Alchemist Millionare, you are trying to build up a farm and sell potions, why staying alive long enough to become a millionare. Every night you defend against monsters with your sword and the potions you make.

NOTE: Since this is a 6 Days project it is kinda unfinised. I will continue developing it, but at the current state some helpful mechanics are missing and bugs can appear at the strangest places. It may be terribly inbalanced, I had not enough time for proper balancing. Feel free to report anything you stumble upon!
